response.original_title: Palayain! The Filipino People Fight for Peace (Act 1)
response.overview: Act 1 of the BAYAN USA Peace Mission documentary focuses on U.S. imperialist war and its life and death impacts on Filipino lives and land. Peace Mission delegates developed this documentary to uplift the stories and struggles of these communities and bring to light the real day-to-day impacts of U.S. intervention.
response.title: Palayain! The Filipino People Fight for Peace (Act 1)
